name: Talks
tagline: Slide decks and videos of talks given by Andrew Andrade
body:
# Talks By Andrew Andrade

This webpage contains talk given by Andrew Andrade.  I havn't had time to add any talks before November 6 but I will soon!

## Guest Talk at [Dean's Advisory Council](https://uwaterloo.ca/engineering/about/dean-engineering/deans-advisory-council)
### A Deterministically Chaotic Journey of a Modern MTE student

[Slides](http://mrandrewandrade.com/talks/dean-advisory-council-meeting-nov-2015.html)

## Guest Talk Eastern Canadian Student Energy Conference (Nov. 6 2015)

### "The Insider story of Andrew Andrade"
[![Energy Conference Talk](http://img.youtube.com/vi/QKAaRTEQqmo/0.jpg)](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QKAaRTEQqmo "Insider Story of Andrew Andrade's Journey")

[Slides](http://mrandrewandrade.com/talks/ecsec2015.html)

[ECSEC 2015 event page](http://speuwaterloo.ca/events/ecsec-2015/)
